projects.title: AI Interview Mocker
projects.description: Full-stack AI interview simulator with real-time answer evaluation and personalized feedback using Google Gemini AI. Integrated speech-to-text for enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Voicemail System
projects.description: Advanced voicemail system with SMS, email, and WhatsApp notifications using Twilio API. Features secure message storage and real-time alerts.

projects.title: SecureAuth System
projects.description: Modern password-less authentication system with magic links and secure session management. Built with React and Node.js backend.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: Java console application managing student records with MySQL database. Implements full CRUD operations and secure data handling.

projects.title: Bookstore E-Commerce App
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce template for book catalog management with responsive design and dynamic data display.

projects.title: PhishNet Security Platform
projects.description: Phishing awareness and credential logging simulation for ethical hacking education and cybersecurity awareness.
